completed_tasks: clel-015: Atom watch functions - add-watch, remove-watch, notify watchers on reset!/swap!
decisions_made: Atom structure: (list 'clel-atom val watchers-alist) - allows nth access for value and watchers
clojure.core/deref mapping needed for @ reader macro (expands to qualified symbol)
Watchers called with (key atom old-val new-val) matching Clojure semantics

swarm_conventions.file_conflicts: Multiple slaves editing same file get 'modified since last read' - they re-read and retry
